resources.string: The aim of this game is to complete as many squares as possible. To do that, you have to click on the available squares. When you click on them another 4 squares appears (up, right,down,left).

If a squares is already available and another squares must appear in that place, you will lose, unless the clicked square is PROTECTED on that side. A square is protected on one side if it is colored in black at that side. This means you don\'t have to worry if there is already a square available near the protected side of the clicked square, you are safe on that side !

You can play different sizes of puzzles. The score for each size is calculated in this way:

 -each cell available is 1 point
 -each time you reset a game you lose 5, 7 or 10 points (depending on what type of game you play)
 -each time you change the game of the same type after you have already begun it, you lose 6, 16 or 33 points

-if you have more that 21, 43 or 90 squares available (depending on what type of game you play), you get 25, 49 or 100 bonus points\n -when you change a game the positive score of that game is divided with the number of minutes that have passed\n -if you click a wrong square you lose 25, 49 or 100 points
